channel.title: Ubuntu Edge
channel.description:
[center][youtube]http://youtu.be/eQLe3iIMN7k[/youtube]
[img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/dark/edge-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/dark/edge-2-thumb.jpg[/img][img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/dark/edge-4-thumb.jpg[/img][img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/dark/edge-3-thumb.jpg[/img] [img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/dark/edge-2.jpg[/img] [youtube]http://youtu.be/fFN4k-AFEbw[/youtube] [img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/515/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/ui/ui-3.jpg[/img] [img]http://assets.ubuntu.com/sites/ubuntu/518/u/img/campaigns/22072013_gogo/ui/ui-4.jpg[/img] [youtube]http://youtu.be/EtNhlVn3ETQ[/youtube] Technical specifications
Dual boot Ubuntu mobile OS and Android Fully integrated Ubuntu desktop PC when docked Fastest multi-core CPU, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage Micro-SIM 4.5in 1,280 x 720 HD sapphire crystal display 8mp low-light rear camera, 2mp front camera Dual-LTE, dual-band 802.11n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4, NFC GPS, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer Stereo speakers with HD audio, dual-mic recording, Active Noise Cancellation 11-pin connector providing simultaneous MHL and USB OTG 3.5mm jack Silicon-anode Li-Ion battery 64 x 9 x 124mm
[size=14pt][b]For full details click [url=http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ubuntu-edge--35/x/4101518]Here[/url][/b][/size]
I am personally excited for this phone. I just hope the price is right for it. [/center]

item.title: Ubuntu Edge
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:5, topic:526728”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=645474.msg4341692#msg4341692 date=1375254373]

Been waiting for this one since over a year. Let’s hope they have some low-end ones since I don’t pull out a lot of budget just for a phone.

If u have google nexus or something, you can install it already
i had mines for the longest, since ubuntu came out for these mobile devices
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Nexus7/Installation
[/quote]
I was waiting for the actual official ubuntu releases, this seems to be another android layer like the one you say.
Didn’t check the info yet at my previous post.[/quote]
?? this is developed by Canonical
Ubuntu not equal android

Read full topic

item.description:

Been waiting for this one since over a year. Let’s hope they have some low-end ones since I don’t pull out a lot of budget just for a phone.

https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Nexus7/Installation[/quote]

Didn’t check the info yet at my previous post.

item.title: Ubuntu Edge
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[center][youtube]http://youtu.be/eQLe3iIMN7k[/youtube]

edge-1.jpg580×573



[youtube]http://youtu.be/fFN4k-AFEbw[/youtube]


[youtube]http://youtu.be/EtNhlVn3ETQ[/youtube]
Technical specifications

Dual boot Ubuntu mobile OS and Android
Fully integrated Ubuntu desktop PC when docked
Fastest multi-core CPU, 4GB RAM, 128GB storage
Micro-SIM
4.5in 1,280 x 720 HD sapphire crystal display
8mp low-light rear camera, 2mp front camera
Dual-LTE, dual-band 802.11n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4, NFC
GPS, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, compass, barometer
Stereo speakers with HD audio, dual-mic recording, Active Noise Cancellation
11-pin connector providing simultaneous MHL and USB OTG
3.5mm jack
Silicon-anode Li-Ion battery
64 x 9 x 124mm

[size=14pt]For full details click Here[/size]

I am personally excited for this phone. I just hope the price is right for it.
[/center]
